entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain this morning. Rain along the coast this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
